io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.window.api

Class SlidingWindowFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.window.api.NonMergingWindowFunction
      • io.gearpump.streaming.dsl.window.api.SlidingWindowFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WindowFunction, java.io.Serializable, scala.Equals, scala.Product

    public class SlidingWindowFunction
extends NonMergingWindowFunction
implements scala.Product, scala.Serializable
    Elements are assigned to non-merging sliding windows for calculation.

    param: size window size param: step window step to slide forward

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
